column4: Whats the best way to delete programs installed from source ? just use slocate to locate the program then delete files ?
No. use make uninstall if the Makefile has this option. If no uninstall option, use instead make dist or make dist-clean
thanks, where do i run make uninstall ? in the program installation folder, or untar the tarball then cd and run from there
Run it in the same dir you originally ran make or make install from
